title: Playing an immobile champion in this game is like being a cripple
body:
Most of them don't have enough power to make up for it and those who do are usually very oppressive (Look at MF doing half your HP in lane because he bounced her Q off a minion, or Jhin just to name a few)

You are team dependent, you can't play safe, you can't do anything by yourself against mobility.

Stuns: apply instantly, lock all actions for the entire duration (save cleanses)

Snares: lock movement actions for the duration

Suppression: stun that blocks summoner cleanse

Stasis: blocks all action by and to said target

All of these apply instantly. 

Drowsy/sleep: applies after a delay and breaks upon any champion damage. This is automatically weaker than every other one of the above by leaps and bounds.
